donation_goals.configure_charity: Please first configure a Streamlabs Charity or a Tiltify campaign!
donation_goals.premium_limit: You reached the maximum donation goals you can create.
donation_goals.non_premium_limit:
@:donation_goals.premium_limit 
Become a premium member to create up to {MAX} donation goals.
donation_goals.tiltify_not_campaign: Your Tiltify account is not part of any fundra$ campaign
donation_goals.counter_empty: You have not created any counter
donation_goals.streamlabs_charity_not_connected: Please connect Twitchat with Streamlabs and configure the Streamlabs Charity campaign
donation_goals.param_hideDone: Automatically hide completed donation goals after 10s
donation_goals.param_notifyTips: Notify details of every donations received
donation_goals.param_autoDisplay: Hide donation goal list after 10 seconds of inativity
donation_goals.param_maxDisplayedEntries: Also show the next {VALUE} goal | Also show the next {VALUE} goal | Also show the next {VALUE} goals
donation_goals.param_goal_secret_blur: Text unblurred only when goal is completed
donation_goals.param_goal_secret_progressive: Letters are unblurred individually according to progression
